A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
It might look better than the prequels\, but they at least they had an actual plot that didn't undermind the whole premise of the Star Wars mythopoeia by making both sides look like partisan hacks in a dumb war that doesn't seem to affect the galaxy and benefits\, in the end\, rogues like Benicio del Toro and the arms dealers both sides fund.
Lucasfilm/Marvel comic books of the recent line actually addressed this properly in the Darth Vader line!!! They could have started by knowing their own materials.
